verses.verse: וַיָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo Then came אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim, certain מִזִּקְנֵ֖י <S%H2205><s%> miz-zik-Nei of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu unto me and sat לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai. before פ Peh

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim men הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these הֶעֱל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-Lu have set up גִלּֽוּלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-lei-Hem their idols עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in לִבָּ֔ם <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bam, in their heart וּמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <S%H4383><s%> u-mich-Shol the stumblingblock עֲוֹנָ֔ם <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Nam, of their iniquity נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu and put נֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> No-chach before פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei-Hem; their face הַאִדָּרֹ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> ha-'id-da-Rosh should I be enquired אִדָּרֵ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> 'id-da-Resh of at all לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H99999><s%> la-Hem. ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore דַּבֵּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dab-ber- Therefore speak א֠וֹתָם <S%H853><s%> o-tom וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta unto them and say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem to כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish Every man אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יַעֲלֶ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh that setteth up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גִּלּוּלָ֜יו <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-Lav his idols אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in לִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo, in his heart וּמִכְשׁ֤וֹל <S%H4383><s%> u-mich-Shol the stumblingblock עֲוֹנוֹ֙ <S%H5771><s%> a-vo-No of his iniquity יָשִׂים֙ <S%H7760><s%> ya-Sim and putteth נֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> No-chach before פָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav, his face וּבָ֖א <S%H935><s%> u-Va and cometh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi; to the prophet אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I the LORD נַעֲנֵ֧יתִי <S%H6030><s%> na-'a-Nei-ti will answer ל֦וֹ <S%H99999><s%> lo ; בָהּ vah כבָ֖א <S%H99999><s%> Va קבְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> be-Ro according to the multitude גִּלּוּלָֽיו׃ <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-Lav. of his idols

לְמַ֛עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an order תְּפֹ֥שׂ <S%H8610><s%> te-Fos That I may take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּלִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-Bam; in their own heart אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who נָזֹ֙רוּ֙ <S%H2114><s%> na-Zo-ru because they are all estranged מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lai, and בְּגִלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1544><s%> be-gil-lu-lei-Hem from me through their idols כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam. all ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore אֱמֹ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor Therefore say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD שׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vu Repent וְהָשִׁ֔יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ve-ha-Shi-vu, and turn מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from גִּלּֽוּלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-lei-Chem; [yourselves] from your idols וּמֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> u-me-'Al from כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all תּוֹעֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-vo-tei-Chem from all your abominations הָשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ha-Shi-vu and turn away פְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> fe-nei-Chem. your faces

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki For אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish For every one אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish anyone מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וּמֵהַגֵּר֮ <S%H1616><s%> u-me-hag-Ger or of the stranger אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> ya-Gur that sojourneth בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El in Israel וְיִנָּזֵ֣ר <S%H5144><s%> ve-yin-na-Zer which separateth מֵֽאַחֲרַ֗י <S%H310><s%> me-'a-cha-Rai, himself from me וְיַ֤עַל <S%H5927><s%> ve-Ya-'al and setteth up גִּלּוּלָיו֙ <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-Lav his idols אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo, in his heart וּמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <S%H4383><s%> u-mich-Shol the stumblingblock עֲוֹנ֔וֹ <S%H5771><s%> a-vo-No, of his iniquity יָשִׂ֖ים <S%H7760><s%> ya-Sim and putteth נֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> No-chach before פָּנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav; his face וּבָ֤א <S%H935><s%> u-Va and cometh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi to a prophet לִדְרָשׁ־ <S%H1875><s%> lid-rosh- to enquire ל֣וֹ <S%H99999><s%> lo בִ֔י <S%H99999><s%> Vi, אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of him concerning me I the LORD נַֽעֲנֶה־ <S%H6030><s%> na-'a-neh- will answer לּ֖וֹ <S%H99999><s%> lo בִּֽי׃ <S%H99999><s%> Bi.

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will set פָנַ֜י <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nai my face בָּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ba-'Ish against that man הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he וַהֲשִֽׂמֹתִ֙יהוּ֙ <S%H8074><s%> va-ha-si-mo-Ti-hu and will make לְא֣וֹת <S%H226><s%> le-'ot him a sign וְלִמְשָׁלִ֔ים <S%H4912><s%> ve-lim-sha-Lim, and a proverb וְהִכְרַתִּ֖יו <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Tiv and I will cut him off מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch from the midst עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi; of my people וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

וְהַנָּבִ֤יא <S%H5030><s%> ve-han-na-Vi And if the prophet כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> chi- if יְפֻתֶּה֙ <S%H6601><s%> ye-fut-Teh be deceived וְדִבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-Ber when he hath spoken דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var, a thing אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I the LORD פִּתֵּ֔יתִי <S%H6601><s%> pit-Tei-ti, have deceived אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et הַנָּבִ֣יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi that prophet הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; and I וְנָטִ֤יתִי <S%H5186><s%> ve-na-Ti-ti and I will stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di my hand עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, against וְהִ֨שְׁמַדְתִּ֔יו <S%H8045><s%> ve-Hish-mad-Tiv, upon him and will destroy מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch him from the midst עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi of my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel

וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> ve-na-se-'U And they shall bear עֲוֹנָ֑ם <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Nam; the punishment of their iniquity כַּֽעֲוֹן֙ <S%H5771><s%> ka-'a-Von the punishment הַדֹּרֵ֔שׁ <S%H1875><s%> had-do-Resh, of him that seeketh כַּעֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> ka-'a-Von shall be even as the punishment הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi of the prophet יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> Yih-Yeh. become

לְ֠מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> Le-ma-'an order לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- may no יִתְע֨וּ <S%H8582><s%> yit-'U may go no more astray ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od longer בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- That the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵאַֽחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> me-'a-cha-Rai, from me וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and no יִטַּמְּא֥וּ <S%H2930><s%> yit-tam-me-'U neither be polluted ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od longer בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all פִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6588><s%> pish-'ei-Hem; any more with all their transgressions וְהָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-Ha-yu become לִ֣י li לְעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am, but that they may be my people וַֽאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אֶהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> 'eh-Yeh become לָהֶם֙ <S%H99999><s%> la-Hem לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him, and I may be their God נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. GOD פ Peh

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came again to me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man אֶ֚רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz when the land כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki if תֶחֱטָא־ <S%H2398><s%> te-che-ta- sinneth לִי֙ li לִמְעָל־ <S%H4603><s%> lim-'ol- against me by trespassing מַ֔עַל <S%H4604><s%> Ma-'al, grievously וְנָטִ֤יתִי <S%H5186><s%> ve-na-Ti-ti then will I stretch out יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di mine hand עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha, against וְשָׁבַ֥רְתִּי <S%H7665><s%> ve-sha-Var-ti upon it and will break לָ֖הּ lah מַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> mat-teh- the staff לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> La-chem; of the bread וְהִשְׁלַחְתִּי־ <S%H7971><s%> ve-hish-lach-ti- thereof and will send בָ֣הּ <S%H99999><s%> vah רָעָ֔ב <S%H7458><s%> ra-'Av, famine וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Ti upon it and will cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah both אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> u-ve-he-Mah. and beast

וְ֠הָיוּ <S%H1961><s%> Ve-ha-yu become שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet Though these three הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim men הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh even these בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Chah, were in it נֹ֖חַ <S%H5146><s%> No-ach Noah; דָּנִאֵל da-ni-'el כדָּנִיאֵ֣ל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-'El Daniel קוְאִיּ֑וֹב <S%H347><s%> ve-'i-Yov; and Job הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah by בְצִדְקָתָם֙ <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-Tam by their righteousness יְנַצְּל֣וּ <S%H5337><s%> ye-natz-tze-Lu they should deliver נַפְשָׁ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sham, [but] their own souls נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. GOD
